name: FTC
description:
Finish Them Chores (FTC) is a puzzle platformer game (8 months "chore", 2014).

You wake up and have a simple task:

Finish your chores before your mom gets home!

Example of Chores:

Grab your clothes and put em in the washer

Clean up the kitchen

Dust up the living room

and many more to discover!

Current Features

  • next-next-gen graphics
  • current-gen gameplay
  • educational purpose
  • keyboard-only (classic controls)
  • light story elements
  • MUSIC!
  • two levels of difficulty
  • one screen square(ish) platformer
  • making chores fun
  • easter eggs/secrets ;)
